thread.title: CBT Nuggets Announces Cisco CCDP Course
thread.title_full: CBT Nuggets Announces Cisco CCDP Course - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CBT Nuggets Announces Cisco CCDP Course
text:
New video training course with Jeremy Cioara covers designing enterprise-level networks.
Eugene, Oregon
CBT Nuggets announces the release of a new video training course, " Cisco CCDP 642-874 ARCH ."
This comprehensive 8-hour course focuses on how to design enterprise networks from start to finish, and is aimed at IT pros or students who have several years of networking experience. During the course, CBT Nuggets trainer Jeremy Cioara covers topics such as High Availability design, IPv6 planning, MPLS, netflow, and more.
"Implementing a proper network design will teach IT professionals to set up the network right from the start," Cioara said. "This saves employees and companies plenty of potential downtime."
This training is associated with Cisco's expert-level CCDP certification.
"Cisco CCDP 642-874 ARCH" is available as part of a CBT Nuggets subscription. Subscriptions are available for individuals or teams, and can be paid monthly or yearly.
About CBT Nuggets: CBT Nuggets creates on-demand IT training for individuals and teams that is available 24/7, from any device.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13007524.htm
